# BenTrade Copilot Instructions

You are working on the BenTrade application.

BenTrade is an options trading analysis platform focused on:
- High-probability, risk-defined options strategies
- Expected value (EV) and probability-based trade selection
- Moderate, consistent income

Core principles:
1) Data integrity first.
2) One canonical trade structure.
3) Tradier is the source of truth for option chains.
4) Simplicity over complexity.
5) Do not introduce new frameworks during cleanup.
6) Null is better than incorrect values.
